title.narrative: Support on the Development of National Strategy for the Control of Heavy Metal Emissions and its Demonstration in Key Polluted Areas

description.narrative: Perfecting the national and regional policy framework of heavy metal pollutant emission control of China (hereinafter referred to as policy framework) and effectively reducing heavy metal pollution so as to protect human health and environmental safety and improve sustainable development.

participating-org.narrative: European Commission - Directorate-General for International Partnerships (INTPA)
European Commission - Directorate-General for International Partnerships (INTPA)

organisation.narrative: Delegation of the European Union to China

department.narrative: Delegation of the European Union to China

description.narrative: China: Beijing and Hunan province (Shuikoushan Area, Hengyang city, Hunan Province)

policy-marker.narrative: Aid Targeting the Objectives of the Convention on Biological Diversity
Aid Targeting the Objectives of the Convention to Combat Desertification
Aid Targeting the Objectives of the Framework Convention on Climate Change - Adaptation
Aid Targeting the Objectives of the Framework Convention on Climate Change - Mitigation
Reproductive, Maternal, Newborn and Child Health (RMNCH)

transaction.ref: XI-IATI-EC_INTPA-2013/323-548/FIRST INSTALMENT FOR THE PROJECT DCI-ASIE/2013/323-548-SUPPORT ON THE DEVELOPMENT OF NATIONAL STRATEGY FOR THE CO

title.narrative: Status of a National Action Plan for Heavy Metal Pollutant Control together with assessment indicators

description.narrative: Status of a National Action Plan for Heavy Metal Pollutant Control together with assessment indicators

title.narrative: Status of a National Action Plan for Heavy Metal Pollutant Control together with assessment indicators

description.narrative: Reported results indicators by the European Commission ¿ International Cooperation and Development (DEVCO) may not represent the complete set of indicators monitored for the project. The results are reported using a contribution approach. This means that where a project has been financed by the EU jointly with other funders ¿ such as partner country governments or other donors ¿ the overall outputs of the collective effort are reported rather than outputs attributed to the share of funding provided by the EU. For higher levels of results, such as outcomes and impacts, the project will only have contributed to the overall effort.

baseline.value: No action plan or indicators existing, at national level

comment.narrative: No action plan or indicators existing, at national level

target.value: a national level National Action Plan for Heavy Metal Pollutant Control together with assessment indicators is developed

comment.narrative: a national level National Action Plan for Heavy Metal Pollutant Control together with assessment indicators is developed

actual.value: a national level National Action Plan for Heavy Metal Pollutant Control together with 73 assessment indicators was developed and adopted
